thread.section_title: Hotel France Albion - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: True esscence of the french hospitality
thread.title_full: True esscence of the french hospitality - Review of Hotel France Albion, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Aishwarya C
title: True esscence of the french hospitality
text: We stayed here for 3 nights. Although the rooms can be considered a bit small we realised that its similar with many hotels in Paris. This place offers a wonderful spread for breakfast. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. I would like to specially mention Henry here, we had an early morning train to catch and Henry went out of his way and prepared a "before time" breakfast for us. I shall never forget this gesture.. Wish you all the luck..
